title: National data on the bed-day price (total) per APR-DRG and degree of severity (2017)
description: The APR_DRG dataset concerns the financial feedback per pathology according to the All Patients Refined Diagnosis Related Groups (APR DRG) classification system.
publisher: National Institute for Health and Disability Insurance; Federal Public Service Public Health, Food Chain Safety and Environment
keyword: National Institute for Health and Disability Insurance
Federal Public Service Public Health, Food Chain Safety and Environment

dataset.title: National data on the cost of care per pathology according to the All Patients Refined Diagnosis Related Groups (APR DRG) classification system.
